.. image:: phishme_logo_200x72.png

Welcome to the documentation for PhishMe Intelligence! This is developed and maintained by PhishMe's Solutions
Engineering Intelligence team. If you have any questions, please contact them at support@phishme.com.

The documentation is divided into 3 sections:

**Analysts:**

This section contains documentation how to use the investigative tools provided by PhishMe and what each field of data
presented in those tools represents.

**Developers And Users:**

This section contains documentation about the PhishMe Intelligence Python library, the underlying REST API, and current
PhishMe Intelligence integrations.

**Release Notes:**

This section contains product release notes.

   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Contents:

   developers_and_users
